name: Horrorsounds
0:
”Alexa open horror sounds”
”Alexa ask horror sounds for a creepy laugh”
”Alexa ask horror sounds for a scary scream”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: horror sounds
des:
listen to various random horror sounds with this skill.
Now we have 100+ different types of horror sounds available.
you can listen to multiple sounds in one session and also repeat any sounds that you like.
now enjoy the improved visual experience with short horror visuals.
you can use some example phrases like (next sound, tell me next, or answering questions with yes or no).
for the exit, you can say stop.

Now enjoy horror sounds in various categories with one-shot invocation. follow the below commands :

a) creepy laugh
 Alexa, ask horror sounds for a creepy laugh
Alexa, ask horror sounds to play a creepy laugh
Alexa, ask horror sounds to play a creepy laugh sound

b) Halloween 
 Alexa, ask horror sounds for a Halloween sound
Alexa, ask horror sounds to play a Halloween sound
Alexa, ask horror sounds to play a Halloween horror sound

c) spooky
 Alexa, ask horror sounds for a spooky
Alexa, ask horror sounds to play a spooky sound
Alexa, ask horror sounds to play a spooky horror sound

d) scream
 Alexa, ask horror sounds for a scary scream
Alexa, ask horror sounds to play a screaming sounds
Alexa, ask horror sounds to play a horror screaming sound

a) ambient horror
 Alexa, ask horror sounds for an ambient horror sound
Alexa, ask horror sounds to play an ambient horror sound
Alexa, ask horror sounds to start a creepy laugh sound

a) creepy laugh
 Alexa, ask horror sounds for a creepy laugh
Alexa, ask horror sounds to play a creepy laugh
Alexa, ask horror sounds to play a creepy laugh sound

a) horror trailer
 Alexa, ask horror sounds for a horror trailer sound
Alexa, ask horror sounds to play a horror trailer sound
Alexa, ask horror sounds to start a horror trailer sound
------------- Alexa routines----------------------

Follow Alexa's routines for every update of this skill.
Follow some steps for Adding this skill to Alexa routines:-
1 - Open your Alexa App.
2 - Select Routines.
3 - Select Schedule, add a time (say 7 AM).
4 - Choose Skills / Your Skills.
5 - Choose “Horror sounds”. Done.

like it, share it, and review it. thanks in advance.

Note: 
 This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.
Now, the user will listen to a product recommendation after 5 sounds.
